creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Hi:
  When i am trying to extract 

jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1.tar.Z

by first doing uncompress and then 

"tar xvf ..."

I am seeing the checksum error as follow



==================
.......
.......
.......
.......
he/catalina/startup, 0 bytes, 0 tape blocks
x jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1/webapps/ROOT/catalina-javadoc/org/apache/catalina/startup/UserDatabase.html, 9606 bytes, 19 tape blocks
x jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1/webapps/ROOT/catalina-javadoc/org/apache/catalina/startup/CatalinaBlock.html, 8995 bytes, 18 tape blocks
x jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1/webapps/ROOT/catalina-javadoc/org/apache/catalina/startup/ContextConfig.html, 10536 bytes, 21 tape blocks
x jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1/webapps/ROOT/catalina-javadoc/org/apache/catalina/startup/Embedded.html, 49853 bytes, 98 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error

=============


Thanks
-Ramesh.Mandava
